other_tests.findings: Preliminary pathological review showed hematopoietic elements and a number of CD45+ B cells, which raised concern about lymphoma.
Showed focal uptake in the inferior right hepatic lobe and the left upper abdomen, findings consistent with both intrahepatic splenosis and a residual splenule.

other_tests.procedure_name: Excisional biopsy of a left axillary lymph node
other_tests.findings: Showed architectural distortion due to an interfollicular expansion of reactive T cells, with preservation of follicular structures, and in situ hybridization positive for EBV-encoded small RNA, consistent with EBV infection.
